meta.name: AI-Powered Knowledge Assistant using Google Sheets, OpenAI, and Supabase Vector Search

nodes.name: AI Agent
nodes.notes:
ü§ñ CORE AI AGENT

This is the main LangChain agent that:
- Receives formatted conversation history
- Uses vector database for context retrieval
- Can search web when needed
- Maintains conversation memory
- Generates intelligent responses

Connected Tools:
‚úÖ Vector Store (knowledge base)
‚úÖ SerpAPI (web search)
‚úÖ Memory buffer
‚úÖ OpenAI GPT-4

nodes.name: Extract Message
nodes.notes:
üìù MESSAGE EXTRACTION

Extracts key data from Google Sheets:
- user_message: The actual question/request
- chat_id: Unique identifier for this conversation

This data flows to:
‚Üí Chat history retrieval
‚Üí Response formatting

nodes.name: Format Conversation
nodes.notes:
üîÑ CONVERSATION FORMATTER

Processes chat history into proper format:

1. Takes chat history from Google Sheets
2. Converts to OpenAI message format:
   - role: 'system' | 'user' | 'assistant'
   - content: message text
3. Keeps last 10 messages for context
4. Adds current user message
5. Includes system prompt with instructions

Output: Properly formatted conversation array for AI agent

nodes.name: OpenAI Chat Model
nodes.notes:
üß† MAIN LANGUAGE MODEL

OpenAI GPT-4.1-nano for:
- Natural conversation
- Complex reasoning
- Task completion
- Creative responses

Setup Required:
‚Üí Add OpenAI API credentials
‚Üí Ensure sufficient quota

nodes.name: Embeddings OpenAI
nodes.notes:
üéØ VECTOR EMBEDDINGS

Converts text to numerical vectors for:
- Semantic similarity search
- Context retrieval from knowledge base
- Intelligent document matching

Uses OpenAI's text-embedding-3-small model

nodes.name: Vector Store LLM
nodes.notes:
üîç KNOWLEDGE BASE LLM

Dedicated model for vector store queries:
- Processes retrieved documents
- Summarizes relevant context
- Filters information for main agent

Separate from main model for efficiency

nodes.name: Vector Store Tool
nodes.notes:
üóÉÔ∏è KNOWLEDGE BASE TOOL

Searches vector database for relevant context:
- Retrieves top 8 most similar documents
- Uses semantic similarity matching
- Provides context to main AI agent

Connected to Supabase vector store

nodes.name: Supabase Vector Store
nodes.notes:
üíæ VECTOR DATABASE

Supabase vector store setup:

1. Create 'documents' table in Supabase
2. Enable vector extension (pgvector)
3. Store embeddings + metadata
4. Enable RLS policies

Table columns needed:
- id, content, metadata, embedding

nodes.name: Conversation Memory
nodes.notes:
üß† CONVERSATION MEMORY

Maintains context across interactions:
- Remembers recent conversation
- Uses custom session key
- Provides continuity for AI agent

Memory Type: Buffer Window
(keeps recent messages in memory)

nodes.name: Google Sheets Trigger
nodes.notes:
üöÄ WORKFLOW TRIGGER

Monitors Google Sheets for new messages:

Required Columns:
- user_message (trigger column)
- ai_respond (AI response)
- id (unique identifier)

Setup Steps:
1. Create Google Sheet with columns
2. Share with service account
3. Connect credentials
4. Set polling interval (every minute)

Triggers when user_message column changes

nodes.name: Check If New Message
nodes.notes:
‚úÖ DUPLICATE PREVENTION

Prevents processing already-answered messages:

‚úì If ai_respond is empty ‚Üí Process message
‚úó If ai_respond has content ‚Üí Skip

This ensures each user message is only processed once, avoiding infinite loops or duplicate responses.

nodes.name: Merge Response Data
nodes.notes:
üîó DATA MERGER

Combines data for final update:

Input 1: Original message + timestamp ID
Input 2: AI agent response

Output: Complete record ready for Google Sheets update with all required fields

nodes.name: Generate Timestamp ID
nodes.notes:
üïê UNIQUE ID GENERATOR

Generates unique timestamp-based ID:
- Uses current timestamp (milliseconds)
- Ensures each message has unique identifier
- Prevents duplicate entries
- Used for Google Sheets row identification

Field: myNewField ‚Üí ID column

nodes.name: Get Chat History
nodes.notes:
üìö CHAT HISTORY RETRIEVAL

Retrieves previous conversations:
- Reads all rows from Google Sheets
- Provides context for conversation formatting
- Enables memory across sessions

Used by Format Conversation node to build proper chat history for AI agent

nodes.name: Update AI Response
nodes.notes:
üíæ RESPONSE STORAGE

Updates Google Sheets with AI response:

Operation: appendOrUpdate
- Matches by user_message column
- Updates ai_respond with agent output
- Adds unique ID for tracking

This completes the conversation loop and makes the response visible to users

nodes.name: Web Search Tool
nodes.notes:
üåê WEB SEARCH CAPABILITY

Provides real-time web search for AI agent:
- Access to current information
- Google search results
- Supplements knowledge base

Setup Required:
‚Üí SerpAPI account & API key
‚Üí Sufficient search quota

AI agent automatically uses when needed
